title: Bug 49235 - Incorrect output in ServletContainerInitializer onStartup method
description: Bug 49235 - During the execution of the onStartup method in ServletContainerInitializer, the expected output is not being received. The output should be 'MySomeClass', but instead it is 'MySomeAnn'.
OB: During the execution of the onStartup method in ServletContainerInitializer, the output is 'MySomeAnn'.
